Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Team

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Team
public class Team extends Object
The Team is the entity used to model the behaviour of those playing the game. For two or three players' games the entity acts as a capsule for a single player giving it a more complete behaviour. In case of four players' game it acts as a grouping mechanism for each of the couple of players.
